name: Daniel Shutts
text: I'm here all the time. People here are great and the forklifts try to get you loaded or unloaded as fast as possible. Love this yard and the professionalism here.

name: Mark Watkins
text: Great place ! Got me in and out in an hour ! The lady at the office ( crystal ) very helpful and polite

name: Jay Jones
text: Great products , amazing staff

name: Monte Hall
text: Easy to get to

name: Amanda Lee
text: Great place to get rock if you can ever get anyone in the scale house to answer the phone

name: Phill A
text: Great selection...  Several rocks on display.

name: David P
text: Great Place Great Material. Great QC Specialist

name: Michael Steele
text: Rocks....everywhere

name: Shannon Creel
text: Good place to get your rocks

name: Jerry Giblin
text: Nice folks

name: Scott abandoned
text: They have various types of gravel an a asphalt plant

name: Trace Haynes
text: Chicken fried rice

name: DeWayne Fowler
text: Garrett Contracting installed a road for us behind our house. They did a super job. Josh, as well as the other members of his team, were very professional, accommodating, knowledgeable, and respectful, which says a great deal about this young group of men. Highly recommended!!

name: Morgan Jump
text: I have nothing but good things to say about this company. I inquired about having my driveway repaired and they were out to my house within a few days. Scout was amazing and got the job done exactly how I imagined it would be. Thank y’all so much!

name: Zac Lott
text: I myself own a small civil contracting company and use Garrett Contracting for a lot of my larger excavation projects as well as gravel, sand and slag deliveries. Reliable and affordable.

name: Donnie Pierce
text: We hired Garret Contracting to build a dirt pad for a horse barn. Right away I noticed the great communication between Josh and I. He came out to give us a quote within 24 hours of contacting him and gave us a good, compatible price shortly after. Josh has this positive vibe about him and truly cares about the customer. He is friendly, helpful, professional, reliable and super polite. Unlike other companies I had contacted, he was able to give us a quicker time frame and set us up for about 2 weeks out. Josh gave prompt replies to questions and updated us as the projected date approached. On the construction day he and his crew showed up exactly on time and started to work on the project without any delay. His crew was also very polite and friendly and accommodated our needs. Josh's crew worked efficiently and never took a break and the job was done sooner than we expected. Josh and his crew are particular about their job and giving it their all to meet or exceed the customers expectations. Josh makes sure to check on the progress in between and again once the job is complete. Customer satisfaction is important to him. It has been a real pleasure to work with Josh and I hope he continues to stay true to himself and the way he treats people. His momma raised him right! "Thank you" doesn't seem to be enough to say to Josh and his crew. Right now it's just a "pile of dirt", but it is part of making our dreams come true. It's much more than just a JOB WELL DONE!

name: Paul Pedersen
text:
Not reliable.

I've been trying for over a month to get this company to come out and give me an estimate.

name: Brian Baer
text: Great company

name: Betty Brooks
text: Everyone has always been extremely friendly & professional. The drivers are highly skilled and very helpful. I have used M&M for several jobs from tearing down a house, clearing and hauling off debris, gravel and sand for driveways and mulch. Pricing is always very fair. I highly recommend this company to anyone in Auburn/Opelika and surrounding area for and sand, rock, gravel , demo work and more. Local company that has been around forever.

name: Keith Henderson
text: Very  friendly  staff  takes care of all  your  needs  recommend them for  all your projects 👍

resp.text: Keith, Thank you so much for taking the time to leave an excellent rating. We really appreciate your business. Please let us know what we can do for you in the future.

name: geoff goodman
text: They were very helpful and patient even though we weren't experienced with gravel. Very affordable too.

resp.text: Geoff, Thank you so much for this 5-star review. We really appreciate you being a customer and helping to share the word about us. We’re here for you anytime.

name: Ray Blackwell
text:
Had a chance to meet up with the owner and his great people who work with in the company, I am impressed with the operation of this company. Very relaxed and happy personal.
Call them for all your hauling and construction needs.

resp.text: Wow Ray, Thanks very much for your positive words, we really appreciate the time you took to write such a detailed review! ...

name: Thomas Martin
text: Awesome people to work with.

resp.text: Thanks for the awesome review, Thomas! We work hard to meet expectations like yours, and we’re happy to hear we hit the mark for you. Come back and see us soon.

name: john brinkerhoff
text: I ordered #4 River Rock last week,  and they didn't disappoint.  On time and reasonably priced!

name: MARK WOODHAM
text: They were very nice people.

resp.text: Thanks Mark for the kind words! I will be sure and share with our team.

name: Thomas A Wingate
text:
Truck 169 bad truck driver made an illegal pass. He got in the left turn lane and passed me and  continued on al 29n running 15 to 220 mph over the speed limit.  Watch this guys,  he will hit someone. Called the company.
They really didn't care.

name: Spencer Marshall
text: Best of the best!

resp.text: Thanks Spenser for sharing your rating with us and the community.

name: M Stevens
text: Great selection of bulk wood chips, gravel, fill dirt etc.

name: Parker Brightwell
text: awesome company. Very nice and go out of there way to make sure customer is happy. Will definitely do business with them again.

name: Hunter Knutson
text: I ended up paying 90 dollars for 5 yards of mulch. I am only able to fit about 2 yards in my truck which I did not know at the time but they charged me for the full 5 yards anyway. They wouldn't let me come back to get the rest of the 5 yards I paid for because it "cost money to start the loader up". Even with two bed loads I'd still be paying for 1 yard that I didn't even get so the cost to start the loader up should not be an issue. Not a good company to work with and they are rude to their customers. Definitely not going to give them any more of my business. They cheated me out 3 yards worth of mulch. They assume that because I am young that I do not know what I am talking about. Little do they know that I work with a lot of landscapers in the area. I am surprised they are still in business.

name: Brett Mcanally
text: Business has never been better. We at M & M strive to treat every customer fair and with respect. Hope to see you soon for your hauling needs and more.

name: mike green
text: Purchased several loads of gravel and had them delivered to my business. They were on time and the driver done a great job dumping where he was instructed.

resp.text: We love to hear from our happy customers. Thank you for leaving this awesome comment and we can’t wait to help you with whatever you may need next.

name: Scott Thomas
text: They got dirt.  Woohoo!

name: Eric Matthews
text: Great job

name: Scott Bishop
text: Ok.

resp.text:
Scott,

We pride ourselves on our customer service so we hate to hear you had just an ok experience with us. We welcome feedback from customers so we can make sure we are delivering excellent customer service at all times. Please give us a call at 334-887-3976 and ask for either Lorie or Brett. We look forward to hearing from you.

name: Roman Duprel
text: Good people

name: Betsey Grubbs
text: Good people!

name: Jeff Ott
text:
Worst experience I've had with this company. One lie after a another 3 hr  late said they would spread it
I got 4 piles of it. I was told it would be 26 1/2 ton it was 26, haft ton short I will never use this company again.
